entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
